item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded: This is an example of the sitemap template. The sitemap will show all the pages in your site, and arrange them in a tree-like fashion, displaying top level pages and their respective children.

item.title: Powerful Theme Options
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
A complete Array Of Options

The theme comes with a really easy-to-use, versatile options panel. In it you will have access to all the settings controlling the theme's behavior, being able to customize them to your liking. We have built the options page with versatility in mind, so it offers a really flexible suite of options.

Really Easy To Configure

The options page is really straightforward, and requires to coding at all to get around. All the basic options are toggled with a single click, and each option is descriptive about what it does, and how. Expect no surprises. Your site will be fully functional in a matter of minutes.

Full Customization Tools

If you are an advanced user, you're in luck! The theme options page also features some more advanced settings that allow you to insert custom CSS and Javascript into de theme. You can perform basic customizations in a matter of seconds and without the need of creating a child theme.

item.title: Page Templates
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
The theme allows you to have complete control over each of your pages. Need to create a legal page with no sidebar? Check. Have to build a landing page without a menu or footer. Done. You can change the layout of each page regardles of the rest of your site.

Per Page Layouts

You can have up to five different sidebar setups for each page: no sidebar, left sidebar, right sidebar, two sidebars to the left, two to the right, and two sidebars on opposite sides of your content.

Useful Page Templates

You can have access to a variety of page templates to create even more kickass content: add a sitemap, create a submenu navigation of all child pages, or add a dedicated blog page within your site.

Customizable Header & Footer

In addition to changing the layout of a page, you can also control the appearance of the header, page title, and the footer. Choose between displaying the normal layout, a minimal version with less distractions, or to omit it completely.

item.title: Customizable Typography
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Google fonts, At Your Service

This theme includes a selection of available fonts directly from Google Webfonts, carefully hand-picked to match with all the possible styles of your site. You can easily change the typefaces of various elements in the design with only a few clicks, and no coding at all. The font selection tool features a small preview that will let you see what each font looks like. You can customize the three main typographic elements of this theme: [list icon="angle-right"]
  • The headings, such as page titles and widget headings
  • The navigation of the main menu
  • The body copy
[/list]

item.title: Responsive Design
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Adaptable To Any Screen

This theme is responsive! It has been designed from the ground up to adapt to virtually any device screen, ensuring your content will look great no matter where you visit it from. Every element within is made to be flexible, adaptable, and to gracefully degrade on older browsers. Additionally, the theme's responsive features can easily be controlled from the theme options page, allowing you to disable them if needed. If you wish to, the responsiveness of the theme can be disabled with a simple click. For those who want a more traditional approach to their site, this is a useful option found in the Theme Options page. Doing so will render the site equally on every device at its full resolution.

item.title: Included Demo Content
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
WordPress XML File Included

We have bundled all the content featured in this demo in your download package! Using the native WordPress importer, you can recreate all the pages you see featured here in a matter of minutes, being able to work from there onwards.

Made For Modifications

Additionally, there are some pages specifically designed to be used as templates. they contain a lot of dummy text for you to fill out, while all the layout and shortcodes are already placed. This way you can achieve stunning, fully customized pages with immersive layouts with only a fraction of the effort.

item.title: Custom Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Create Immersive Pages With Little Effort

This theme comes with a great variety of custom shortcodes, built with flexibility in mind. With them you can generate compelling and interactive content, all with only a few lines of code directly in the visual post editor. Here are only a few of the shortcodes you can use to create incredible effects: [column_half] [list icon="angle-right"]
  • Buttons
  • Messages & Notices
  • Accordions
  • Counters
  • Pricing Tables
  • Google maps
[/list] [/column_half][column_half_last] [list icon="angle-right"]
  • Columns & Full Width Sections
  • Dropcaps
  • Custom lists, like this one
  • Social buttons
  • Mini features
  • Progress Bars
[/list] [/column_half_last]

item.title: Premium Support
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Full Support suite

Buyers get full access to premium support, so you can get your site up and running in no time. We'll help you troubleshoot any issue you have during theme installation and setup, and we'll guide you through the proper usage of the theme. Furthermore, you can expect to learn a few tricks to get the most out of WordPress!

Regular updates And Fixes

In addition to offering premium support, we will also release updates regularly in order to improve the theme. That means it will be thoroughly maintained to ensure there are no issues or problems popping up. Should you find out about a bug, you can notify us and we'll investigate into it-- and subsequently releasing an update.

item.title: Unlimited Color Palette
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Easily Customize The Palette

This theme lets you choose virtually any color scheme for your site, being able to set different tones for both typographic elements and backgrounds. By using the powerful theme options panel, you can accomplish this in just a few clicks, easily changing your site's appearance in a few minutes. The following elements can be customized using only the Theme Options page:
  • The primary color, which determines the basic color scheme
  • The secondary color, for other minor elements in the layout
  • Heading color, for titles and
  • Navigation color, for the navigation menus
  • Body color, for everything else

item.title: Multi-Language Integration
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
Ready For Localization

This theme is ready to be translated out of the box! All texts within the theme have been properly adapted so that they can be translated on the fly using gettext. This means you can easily convert it to your native language by using a tool like PoEdit, without having to do any of the programming. Alternatively, you can take advantage of WPML to easily translate all the texts directly from the WordPress admin.

Spanish Translation Included

Since the Spanish language is also one of the most used in the whole world, we also provide a translation for it right out of the box. You can get the theme and install on a localized version of WordPress, and it will automatically display everything in Spanish. You don't need to take any additional steps as you would do with an English WordPress installation.

WPML Integration

The theme also features seamless integration with WPML, the de-facto plugin for creating multilingual websites. You can create entirely independent sites for each language, catering to the specific needs of your users across different countries. This creates a smooth experience for those who want to go international.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
